short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color Fussion will bring your New Tab to life with stunning, eye-catching animation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
❗By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to installing the Color Fussion extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

At Color Fussion, we believe that browsing should be an immersive experience. That's why we created the ultimate new tab extension for Chrome that brings life to your browser. With Color Fussion, we're introducing you to a new world of browsing where every new tab is a mesmerising display of colors and particles.

One of the things we're most proud of is the customisation options we offer. With just one click on the arrow in the top right corner, you can personalise your animation to your liking. We've included a variety of particle effects, colors, and fade options for you to choose from, so you can create a unique animation every time. Plus, we've made it easy for you to set the animation speed and choose from different animation styles, so you can make it truly your own.

But we didn't stop there. We also know how important it is to stay organised, which is why we've included a built-in to-do list. You can easily add, edit, and delete tasks to stay on top of your schedule. And with our weather forecast feature, you'll always know what to expect for the day.

We want to make browsing more than just about visiting websites. We want to make it an experience. That's why we created Color Fussion, to enhance your browsing experience and make every new tab mesmerising. So join us now and discover a new world of browsing.

Learn more about how we keep your data safe:
Privacy: https://colorfussion.com/#privacy
Terms of Use: https://colorfussion.com/#tou
